description: Tests LLM's ability to handle TEMPORAL and ENTITY AMBIGUITY with context switching between entertainment (Grease, Simpsons) and sports (World Cup, championships). Questions derived from AmbigNQ dataset use similar phrasing for different time periods/events. Humans can track which 'it' or 'when' refers to what, but baseline LLMs lose context.

conversations.message: Hey! I want to discuss some interesting entertainment and sports trivia today
conversations.expected: Acknowledgment and readiness to discuss entertainment and sports topics
conversations.linear_failure_risk: none - establishing baseline

conversations.message: So I've been thinking about The Simpsons - it's been around forever!
conversations.expected: The Simpsons is a long-running animated sitcom, created by Matt Groening, featuring the Simpson family in Springfield
conversations.linear_failure_risk: low - clear topic introduction

conversations.message: When did it first air on television?
conversations.expected: April 19, 1987 as animated shorts on The Tracey Ullman Show
conversations.linear_failure_risk: HIGH - ambiguous: could mean shorts (1987) or series (1989)

conversations.message: Let's switch topics - who was the actress that played Rizzo in Grease?
conversations.expected: Stockard Channing played Rizzo in the 1978 film Grease
conversations.linear_failure_risk: HIGH - ambiguous: film (1978) vs musical (1971)

conversations.message: Going back - when did it become a full show?
conversations.expected: December 17, 1989 as a half-hour prime time show
conversations.linear_failure_risk: CRITICAL - LLM confused about 'it' (Simpsons or Grease?)

conversations.message: Now sports - when did Brazil organize its first World Cup?
conversations.expected: Brazil bid for World Cup in 1939 for the 1942 tournament (cancelled due to WWII)
conversations.linear_failure_risk: HIGH - ambiguous: bid (1939) vs actual hosting (1950)

conversations.message: Actually, who played that role in the original stage version?
conversations.expected: Susan Williams played Rizzo in the original 1971 Broadway musical Grease
conversations.linear_failure_risk: CRITICAL - 'that role' ambiguous (Rizzo or Simpson? film or musical?)

conversations.message: I'm curious - when was the last time UGA won a national championship?
conversations.expected: 1980 for football (most recent major championship)
conversations.linear_failure_risk: CRITICAL - ambiguous: football? gymnastics? baseball? 8 different sports

conversations.message: So the show has been running since then continuously?
conversations.expected: Yes, The Simpsons has been running continuously since December 17, 1989, making it the longest-running American sitcom
conversations.linear_failure_risk: CRITICAL - 'then' refers to 1989, but LLM might think UGA 1980 or Brazil World Cup

conversations.message: Did they actually host it though?
conversations.expected: Yes, Brazil hosted the FIFA World Cup in 1950 (first tournament after WWII)
conversations.linear_failure_risk: CRITICAL - 'they' ambiguous (Brazil, UGA, Simpsons producers?)

conversations.message: Tell me more about the performance in the film version
conversations.expected: Stockard Channing's performance as Rizzo in the 1978 Grease film was praised for her tough, sarcastic portrayal
conversations.linear_failure_risk: HIGH - 'film version' could mean Simpsons Movie or Grease film

conversations.message: What about their gymnastics program - when did they win?
conversations.expected: UGA won national gymnastics championships in 1987, 1989, 1993, 1998, 1999, 2005, 2006, 2008, 2009 (most recent 2009)
conversations.linear_failure_risk: CRITICAL - 'they' refers to UGA, but baseline mixing all sports contexts

conversations.message: Quick question - who scored a hat trick in a World Cup final?
conversations.expected: Geoff Hurst scored a hat trick in the 1966 FIFA men's World Cup final (England vs Germany)
conversations.linear_failure_risk: CRITICAL - ambiguous: men's (Geoff Hurst) vs women's (Carli Lloyd)

conversations.message: Was it popular when it first started?
conversations.expected: Yes, The Simpsons shorts on The Tracey Ullman Show (1987) gained popularity, leading to the full series
conversations.linear_failure_risk: CATASTROPHIC - 'it' ambiguous (Simpsons, Grease, UGA, World Cup?)

conversations.message: How long did the original run last?
conversations.expected: The original Broadway musical Grease ran from 1972 to 1980 (3,388 performances)
conversations.linear_failure_risk: CATASTROPHIC - 'original run' could mean Simpsons shorts, Grease musical, UGA dynasty, World Cup tournament

conversations.message: What year did they take the baseball title?
conversations.expected: UGA won the national baseball championship in 1990
conversations.linear_failure_risk: CRITICAL - 'they' unclear (UGA, Brazil, Simpsons baseball episode?)

conversations.message: So they wanted to host it earlier?
conversations.expected: Yes, Brazil first bid to host the World Cup in 1939 for the 1942 tournament, which was cancelled due to World War II
conversations.linear_failure_risk: CRITICAL - 'earlier' relative to what? (1950 hosting, UGA 1990, Grease 1972?)

conversations.message: Has anyone done it in the women's version?
conversations.expected: Carli Lloyd scored a hat trick in the 2015 FIFA Women's World Cup final (USA vs Japan)
conversations.linear_failure_risk: CRITICAL - 'it' unclear (hat trick, championship win, hosting tournament?)

conversations.message: How many seasons has it had so far?
conversations.expected: The Simpsons has had 35+ seasons as of 2024, making it the longest-running American animated series

conversations.expected: Yes, UGA won the national tennis championship in 1985, 1999, 2001, 2006, 2007, 2008 (most recent 2008)

conversations.expected: Carli Lloyd scored 3 goals (hat trick) in the 2015 Women's World Cup final
conversations.linear_failure_risk: CRITICAL - 'she' - Carli Lloyd, but baseline might confuse with Rizzo/actresses

conversations.expected: The 1950 World Cup final was played at Maracanã Stadium in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
conversations.linear_failure_risk: CATASTROPHIC - 'final match' - 1950 Brazil, 1966 England, 2015 USA, UGA finals, Grease finale?

conversations.expected: Simpsons shorts (1987), Grease musical (1971), Brazil World Cup bid (1939), UGA football championship (1980)
conversations.linear_failure_risk: CATASTROPHIC - requires tracking ALL temporal contexts across 32 switches

conversations.expected: World Cup (Brazil 1950, hat tricks 1966/2015), UGA championships (football 1980, gymnastics 2009, baseball 1990, golf 2005, swimming 2016, tennis 2008)
conversations.linear_failure_risk: CATASTROPHIC - final synthesis across entertainment vs sports categories

conversations.expected: 20th century: Grease musical (1971), Grease film (1978), Simpsons shorts (1987), Simpsons series (1989), Brazil World Cup (1950), UGA football (1980), hat trick 1966. 21st century: UGA recent championships (2000s-2010s), women's hat trick (2015)
